item.title: LOOK: Pre-debut photos of Sharon and Kiko's daughter Frankie - ABS CBN News
item.description:
ABS CBN News

MANILA – The eldest daughter of Sharon Cuneta and Senator Francis "Kiko" Pangilinan will soon celebrate her 18th birthday. The pre-debut photos of Frankie have been posted online by Nice Print Photography on Thursday. Simone Francesca Emmanuelle, better known as Frankie, one of the three children of Cuneta and Pangilinan will celebrate her debut on December 16. Here’s a look: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Niceprintphoto (@niceprintphoto) on Dec 5, 2018 at 4:42am PST View this post on Instagram A post shared by Niceprintphoto (@niceprintphoto) on Dec 5, 2018 at 4:58am PST View...

item.title: Mendoza: Abreeza treats media to ‘Three Words to Forever’ - SunStar Philippines
item.description:
Mendoza: Abreeza treats media to ‘Three Words to Forever’  SunStar Philippines

ABREEZA Mall treated the Davao media to a movie night as it blocked an entire cinema for them to watch “Three Words to Forever” exclusively. The film, which topbills Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and Kathryn Bernardo, talks about family and the challenges every member has been trying to resolve. It also tackles the importance of honesty and the family members’ motivation and commitment to keep them intact amid the difficulties and differences. This heartwarming story of Rick and Cristy and their daughter Tin was witnessed by the Davao press during the block screening last November 29. It was...

item.title: Regine's Ring from Sharon Was Inspired by Samantha's Ring in 'Sex and#x26;amp; the City' - Female Network
item.description:
Regine's Ring from Sharon Was Inspired by Samantha's Ring in 'Sex and#x26;amp; the City'  Female Network

IMAGE Instagram/newfrontiertheater Fans are still reeling from Regine Velasquez's expensive gift from Sharon Cuneta. The beloved Asia's Songbird received the gift from the Megastar on November 24, at the Regine At The Movies concert in New Frontier Theater, where the two performed "Bituing Walang Ningning" together! ABS-CBN head writer Darla Sauler posted on Instagram a close-up shot of Regine's new ring, which she proudly wore the next day at ASAP Natin 'To. In an interview with PEP.ph, jeweler Candy Dizon of Jul B. Dizon Jewellry gave more interesting details about the now-famous ring. "...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta denies marital woes, reveals reason for leaving PH - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta denies marital woes, reveals reason for leaving PH  Sun.Star Philippines

MEGASTAR Sharon Cuneta dismissed rumors of marital problems with husband, Senator Francis "Kiko" Pangilinan. A few weeks ago, an edited photo of Pangilinan with fellow Senator Risa Hontiveros surfaced on social media. Netizens speculated that the said photo, where Pangilinan supposedly held hands with Hontiveros, pushed the singer/actress to leave the country to take a short break from show business. In a lengthy Facebook post on Sunday, May 14, the seasoned actress clarified that her departure from the country has nothing to do with the photoshopped images. She also slammed reports of a th...

item.title: Couples Corner: Split or Lit? - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Couples Corner: Split or Lit?  Sun.Star Philippines

THERE are so many things going on in Hollywood coupledom this week. On the heels of the happy news that Big Bang Theory's Jim Parsons happily got married to long-time boyfriend Todd Spiewak, other celebrities have news of their own—both good and bad. Here's the rundown of new couplings in Hollywood and the couples who went their separate ways. Normani Kordei & Bonner Bolton When cowboy Bonner Bolton was eliminated from Dancing with the Stars, he asked Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei out on a date through an interview with Entertainment Tonight. Bolton, 29, learned that Kordei had a bit of a ...

item.title: Kiko Matos talks working with Sharon Cuneta, rematch vs Baron Geisler - Rappler
item.description:
Kiko Matos talks working with Sharon Cuneta, rematch vs Baron Geisler  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – Kiko Matos has faced off with Baron Geisler in a mixed martial arts (MMA) cage and has worked with Nora Aunor in 2016's Kabisera. But now, the actor has another experience to cross off his bucketlist – working with veteran singer-actress Sharon Cuneta. After a press conference for Universal Reality Combat Championship (URCC), Kiko said he was honored to have worked with Sharon, also known as the megastar of Philippine showbiz, on the Cinemalya film Ang Pamilyang Hindi Lumuluha. "Working with the megastar is really light, kasi si Mega, ma-chika siya eh (she shares a lot...

item.title: Bzzzzz: Hitting back at media owners - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Bzzzzz: Hitting back at media owners  Sun.Star Philippines

PRESIDENT Duterte is talking tough against a national broadsheet through real estate leased and a business owned by the two families to whom the paper belongs. -- A realty development firm, which has leased a 2.9-ha. government-owned land in Makati that Duterte would now like to recover. -- A donut food chain that Duterte alleges was able to reduce a P1.5 billion tax liability to P8 million. Duterte would like the food chain to pay “the full tax due.” Duterte calls the families that own those businesses oligarchs and, word-playing on the brand, urged them: “Donut steal.” He has been at it s...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta denies Kiko Pangilinan-Risa Hontiveros affair - Rappler
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta denies Kiko Pangilinan-Risa Hontiveros affair  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – Actress Sharon Cuneta on Sunday, May 14, denied rumors that her marriage to Senator Francis "Kiko" Pangilinan is on the rocks because of an alleged third party. In a message on her official Facebook page, the Voice Teens Philippines mentor, who is on vacation in the United States, said it is not true that her husband is having an affair with his colleague, Senator Risa Hontiveros. The Facebook post was accompanied by an altered photo of the two senators, which had been spreading online in recent days. The two were made to appear like they were holding hands, but they w...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta talks about new movie with Star Cinema - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta talks about new movie with Star Cinema  Sun.Star Philippines

MEGASTAR Sharon Cuneta confirmed that she's working with a new leading man in her upcoming project under Star Cinema. In an interview with the seasoned actress after the Cinemalaya press conference on Thursday, July 13, she announced that her movie with ABS-CBN's film outfit will still push through. She will start filming in September but said she will not be paired with former husband Gabby Concepcion. "I prayed for it. I prayed for the movie that did not push through. If it's not meant to be, I prayed to You. He probably did not want it to push through and then this one did so this is pro...

item.title: FULL LIST: 'The Voice Teens PH' top 4 finalists - Rappler
item.description:
FULL LIST: 'The Voice Teens PH' top 4 finalists  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – After a tough battle, The Voice Teens Philippines coaches now each have a representative for the show's final rounds. After narrowing their options down to the top 8, 4 have been chosen based on the coaches' score and the audience votes. On Saturday, July 22, Lea Salonga and Sarah Geronimo picked their chosen contestants, while Bamboo and Sharon Cuneta announced their picks on Sunday, July 23. The top 4 will move on to the finals, where one of them will be declared the first winner of the The Voice, teen edition. Team Sharon Top 4 finalist: Jeremy Glinoga – "Signs of T...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta doesn't receive Star Magic Ball invite, declines offer from Martin Nievera - CNN Philippines
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta doesn't receive Star Magic Ball invite, declines offer from Martin Nievera  CNN Philippines

Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, September 29) — Actress and singer Sharon Cuneta on Thursday revealed she did not receive an invite to the annual Star Magic Ball, which will be held on September 30. In an Instagram post, the "Megastar" said the invite "probably got lost on its way" to her, but wished those invited to have fun. sharon star magic ball "Must be thrilling for everyone invited to the Star Magic Ball as they prepare for it this year!" Cuneta said. Singer Martin Nievera then chimed in on the comments section, offering Cuneta to be his "date." However, the "The Voice Philippines" c...

item.title: Bzzzzz: 2 women’s names: Risa and Vanessa - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Bzzzzz: 2 women’s names: Risa and Vanessa  Sun.Star Philippines

THE first name is that of Sen. Risa Hontiveros, a colleague of Sen. Kiko Pangilinan. She has been in the rumor circuit after an ALTERED/EDITED photo of her and Kiko (showing her and him holding hands) circulated in social media. Kiko’s wife Sharon Cuneta posted a comment denying the two senators are romantically linked. The second is that of a “Vanessa” that President Duterte floated to and teased reporters with as a mystery woman with whom he has a “new relationship.” The woman is fictional until Duterte will produce evidence of her existence. And what is he doing, making his longtime part...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta declines last-minute Star Magic Ball invite - CNN Philippines
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta declines last-minute Star Magic Ball invite  CNN Philippines

Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, September 29) — Singer and actress Sharon Cuneta on Friday said she has finally received her invitation for the Star Magic Ball, but said she could not attend the event. "Thank you, Star Magic, for delivering our invitation to your Ball one day before. Wish we could go, but I have nothing spectacular to wear and there obviously isn't any more time," Cuneta said. sharon invite On Thursday, the "Megastar" posted on Instagram that she was not invited to the ball, which will be held on Saturday. READ: Sharon Cuneta doesn't receive Star Magic Ball invite, declines...

item.title: WATCH: 'Voice Teens PH' Grand Finals performances - Rappler
item.description:
WATCH: 'Voice Teens PH' Grand Finals performances  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – The Voice Teens Grand Finals kicked off on Saturday, July 29, with the final 4 contestants performing two songs each – one with their coaches and another for the upbeat performance round. Duet round The top 4 finalists performed with their coaches during the duet segment. Bamboo and Isabela Vinzon opened the show, with a video of Bamboo's visit to Isabela's hometown in Pampanga. The two performed "Kapayapaan" by Tropical Depression. {source} {/source} Second to perform were Jeremy Glinoga and his coach Sharon Cuneta. Before their performance, Jeremy took Sharon to Sta ...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta proud of Kris Aquino's role in 'Crazy Rich Asians' - CNN Philippines
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta proud of Kris Aquino's role in 'Crazy Rich Asians'  CNN Philippines

Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, August 29) — Seems like everyone's gone crazy for 'Crazy Rich Asians'. Award-winning singer and actress Sharon Cuneta supported Kris Aquino in her role as Princess Intan. "When one of us has the blessing of being chosen among hundreds to become part of a Hollywood movie - especially from a major studio and based on a best-selling book, WE SHOULD BE HAPPY. PROUD," Cuneta said on Instagram. Cuneta added that however short Kris Aquino's role was in the film, it opened doors for more Filipinos in international cinema. sharon cuneta crazy rich asians "It opens mor...

item.title: Here's How Sharon Cuneta Feels About KC's New Relationship - Female Network
item.description:
Here's How Sharon Cuneta Feels About KC's New Relationship  Female Network

IMAGE Instagram/itskcconcepcion OnAugust 18, KC Concepcion posted a photo of her new boyfriend, French film producer and businessman Pierre-Emmanuel Plassart, on Instagram. The 33-year-old daughter of Sharon Cuneta and Gabby Concepcion captioned it "warm, genuine, timeless." Hours after the story was published on PEP.ph, Sharon posted a screencap of the story on her Instagram account, and gave her seal of approval on the relationship. The Megastar captioned, "My Kristina and Pierre. Not anyone new. "The same Pierre we warmly welcomed into our family and circle years ago. "I am so happy! @i...

item.title: Will Sharon Cuneta, Gabby Concepcion star in a movie again? - Rappler
item.description:
Will Sharon Cuneta, Gabby Concepcion star in a movie again?  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – Sharon Cuneta said that when it comes to doing a movie with former on-screen and off-screen partner Gabby Concepcion, she can't give a concrete answer. In 2016, it was announced that she and ex-husband Gabby would team up in a movie — their first after Tayong Dalawa in 1992. However, due to schedule conflicts, it did not push through. The two reunited for an viral fastfood chain commercial in early 2018. Speaking to reporters at the media conference for her concert Sharon: My 40 Years last Saturday, July 21, Sharon said that she'll leave everything up to her management...

item.title: Sharon Cuneta celebrates 40 years in showbiz with concert - Rappler
item.description:
Sharon Cuneta celebrates 40 years in showbiz with concert  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – Forty years in showbiz is considered a milestone in a fickle industry where fame is hard to sustain. Megastar Sharon Cuneta is one of those fortunate to be blessed with such a long-running career. Sharon will mark her fourth decade in the entertainment industry with a concert "Sharon: My 40 Years" at the Smart Araneta Coliseum on September 28. The concert will not only celebrate her 40-year career but will also be a thank you gift to her loyal fans. "I'm grateful to God. I'm grateful to people who helped me like you. I'm grateful to my fans. I'm grateful to everyone wh...

item.title: Gary Valenciano returns to 'Your Face Sounds Familiar Kids' - Rappler
item.description:
Gary Valenciano returns to 'Your Face Sounds Familiar Kids'  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – Gary Valenciano is back as a judge on Your Face Sounds Familiar Kids after two months of rest. During the show's July 28 episode, host Billy Crawford welcomed the singer who danced to his song "Shout For Joy" as he went onstage. Gary said it was great to be back on the show, and that he missed his co-judges Sharon Cuneta and Ogie Alcasid. "It's good to be back with all of you. This is the start of many, many things I'll be doing for you and with you," he said. {source} Happening now!! @GaryValenciano1 is back on @YourFacePH Kids!! #GaryVisBack #YFSFKGVReturns pic.twitt...

item.title: KC posts note for 2 dads - SunStar Philippines
item.description:
KC posts note for 2 dads  SunStar Philippines

WHILE some people no longer have a father, KC Concepcion is lucky enough to have two doting fathers: biological dad Gabby Concepcion and stepdad Sen. Francisco “Kiko” Pangilinan. On Father’s Day, KC shared her appreciation to both her dads in separate Instagram posts. KC first posted a photo of Pangilinan on Sunday, along with the caption: “The side people rarely see... When he’s not slaying dragons, he’s with the girls giving love advice. Thank you to the main man of our lives: the one who taught me how to use a dictionary, budget my money, plan ahead and be organized. Long nights of talki...
